Text:
Positive Comment:

Thank you..truly..this is more than a gift of labor its a contribution to the digital library of the working man/woman ..long live the 5th international!

Negative comment:

That there are not more folks availing themselves and commenting because they are all off raging and spewing about a messed up copy of 'broken city' speaks volumes as to the 'why' is 'why we're not gonna make it'.

Thanks for this truly awesome and unique collection..
